title: Confirmation that bot games count towards the gift
body: I already know that it does count but a friend doesn't take my word for it, so official Rioter confirmation would be super swell

replies.body: AI vs Coop is matchmade game that will count towards the gift; however, it had to be done by the 19th to be eligible for a gift.  This information is provided in our [announcement ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)page if it helps!  I hope that clears things up for your friend!
